Header: MP Rathana Thera supports the President
Content: Parliamentarian Venerable Athuraliye Rathana Thera has expressed his support to the President. Expressing his views at a media briefing at the Rajagiriya Sadaham Sevana Asapuwa he emphasized that the political decision taken by the President is timely. He said that the people expected that decision. He further said that the appointment of the new Prime Minister by the President is constitutional.
